title: Poster, "Positions in Architecture", 1976
markings: Stamps: On verso designer stamp in red ink at lower right.
inscribed: Imprinted at UC in brown and white ink :POSIT/IONS/IN . AR/CHITE/CTURE; at L margin in purple ink: Symposium/Rhode/Island School of/Design/ April /16,17, 1976; [followed by organizational information]; at C in purple and white ink: SCHEDULE OF EVENTS...[43 line list of events- lecturers featured: Hans Hollein, Lee Hall, Judy Wolin, Peter Cook, Peter Eisenman, Arata Isosaki...]; at lower margin in purple ink: poster designed by Tom Ockerse;at LL registration and accomodation information imprinted in black ink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Positions in Architecture", 1976.offset lithograph
Support: paper. 1991-69-117.
